title: FS - Graded T206's; 2 EPDG's and 2 Tolstoi's (low populations)

posts.post_title: FS - Graded T206's; 2 EPDG's and 2 Tolstoi's (low populations)
posts.post_content:
For Sale - Graded T206's; 2 EPDG's and 2 Tolstoi's (low to very low populations).  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed sales price to cover ST.

T206 Lou Criger Portrait EPDG 3 - SOLD

T206 Frank Smith, Chicago and Boston Tolstoi SGC 4.5 - $650 venmo no fee or $672.50 pp gs

T206 Red Kleinow Catching Tolstoi SGC 1.5 - $230 venmo no fee or $240 pp gs.

T206 Joe Delahanty EPDG SGC 1 - $140 venmo no fee or $145 pp gs.
